main event: Three control tower operators at Chanute AFB observed a bright bluish-white object with two small satellites moving in the sky on September 16, 1952.
interesting points: The object was visible through binoculars and was about ten times larger than nearby stars., The object moved in a straight path, ascending and changing its heading several times., Observers noted that the object disappeared behind clouds several times during the sighting., A request was made for an aircraft interception, but the pilot did not see the object clearly., The sighting lasted from approximately 2210 hrs to 2235 hrs CDT.
sighted object: a bright bluish-white irregular round object with two small satellites
witness description: control tower operators, one of whom was a former pilot with combat experience
